Html: I am not able to use the scroll wheel to zoom. From the discussions, it appears this is a built-in feature, but it just doesn't work at all for me. Anyone else having this problem with the new build?
So you are saying it SHOULD be working. Is there anything special that I have to do to make it work? I notice it is working in the demo package but not in my own application.

Figured it out:

Use MinZoom and MaxZoom properties.
